description: This table contains Surgical Log (ORL) items related to Clavien Scores for procedural complications.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CLAVIEN_SCORE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item contains the documented Clavien score that defines complication severity for a procedure on a log.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


No complication


Grade I


Grade II


Grade III


Grade IIIa


Grade IIIb


Grade IV


Grade IVa


Grade IVb


Grade V


Grade I d


Grade II d


Grade IIIa d


Grade IIIb d


Grade IVa d


Grade IVb d

columns.name: CLAVIEN_PROC_ID
columns.description: This item contains each procedure on a log requiring a Clavien score that has been documented.

columns.name: CLAVIEN_PROC_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.
